motion.author: therealartengine
motion.title: Changes to Upload
motion.description:
Make the Upload page a single page but put file upload at the beginning to start process while you complete information about the  content. 

Add a simple set of guidelines for optimal video encoding... something with a few options like "We prefer video files encoded to less than 10MB/s with the H265 codec." You could even link to a tool like Shutter Encoder which help to compress videos and save energy.
